thread.section_title: The House of Bachelorette Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of The House of Bachelorette | www.thehouseofbachelorette.com
thread.title: Kim
thread.title_full: The House of Bachelorette reviewed by Kim

author: Kim
title: Kim
text: I was ordering items for a bachelorette party and the potential delivery window was one day after our trip. I reached out to customer service via the chat function and the representative was soooo accomodating, polite, and quick! As soon as I gave her my order number, she was able to get the items shipped that day and I received the package two days later. Also, the packaging was very careful and they give you plenty of complimentary mints! LOVE, LOVE, LOVE The House of Bachelorette and will recommend them to all of my friends!
